scenes.background: You decide to help with the report. [Monica] and [Bob] are working on the presentation.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'Monica and I have made some changes. Can you incorporate them into the report?'

options.text: I'll need more details on the changes before I can incorporate them.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and emotional perception, but your social skills might be seen as lacking since you ask for more details rather than taking initiative.

options.text: Sure, I'll get right on it. Just send me the updated details.
options.analysis: You display high empathy and emotional perception by readily agreeing to incorporate the changes, but your motivation may be low as you are relying on their updates.

options.text: I can try, but it might be better if we review the changes together first.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and social skills by suggesting a collaborative review, but emotional perception and empathy are lower as you hesitate to take immediate action.
